          <title>
            <string language="en">Transition metal salts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übergang Metallsalze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sels en métal de transition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sais do metal da transição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sali del metallo di transizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλατα μετάλλων μετάβασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sales del metal de la transición</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the steps in producing transition metal salts from the neutralisation reaction of iron oxide and hydrochloric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transition metal salts</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Jobsteps, wenn sie 
Übergang Metallsalze aus der Neutralisation Reaktion des Eisenoxids 
und der Salzsäure produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre les étapes en 
produisant des sels en métal de transition à partir de la réaction 
de neutralisation de l'oxyde de fer et de l'acide chlorhydrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra as etapas em produzir
sais do metal da transição da reação da neutralização do óxido 
do ferro e do ácido hydrochloric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra i punti nel 
produrre i sali del metallo di transizione dalla reazione di 
neutralizzazione dell'ossido del ferro e dell'acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τα βήματα στην 
παραγωγή των αλάτων μετάλλων μετάβασης από την αντίδραση 
ουδετεροποίησης του οξειδίου σιδήρου και του υδροχλωρικού οξέος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra los pasos de 
progresión en producir las sales del metal de la transición de la 
reacción de la neutralización del óxido del hierro y del ácido 
hidroclórico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salzsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisenoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
